description: This healthier recipe takes the flavours of pizza and transforms them into a pasta salad. The best part? It's ready in 15 minutes and super-easy to make.
keywords: Pasta salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Nov 2021,Sesame free,Quick & easy,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Picnic,Peanut free
name: Pizza Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
0.5 bunch basil, leaves picked, finely shredded
1 small red capsicum, halved, deseeded, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Combine oil, tomato and basil in a large bowl. Season with pepper. Add pasta, onion, capsicum and bocconcini, then toss to combine.
Divide salad among 2 airtight containers. Cover with lids and keep chilled until ready to serve.
